body_html:
@ezyang Thanks!

Well, if the code hygiene and cleanness of ATen stays as it is I don't foresee any particular issue that cannot be fixed case by case.

But I'm all in for CI/CD as well and I can investigate it, just not sure if you guys care so much ( would probably slow down some builds/ use build agents resources etc )

I'm gonna automate the build for our project anyway and I'll keep an eye and submit PRs in case it breaks since we are using it.

Just a bit of rationale behind it:
Other popular libraries are quite impossible to compile to that many platforms so easy! So the potential here is quite big imho. No need for weird converters (kerasjs) or even weirder js clones (tfjs) if you can run the same backbone of torch itself.

body:
@ezyang Thanks!

Well, if the code hygiene and cleanness of ATen stays as it is I don't foresee any particular issue that cannot be fixed case by case.

But I'm all in for CI/CD as well and I can investigate it, just not sure if you guys care so much ( would probably slow down some builds/ use build agents resources etc )

I'm gonna automate the build for our project anyway and I'll keep an eye and submit PRs in case it breaks since we are using it.

Just a bit of rationale behind it:
Other popular libraries are quite impossible to compile to that many platforms so easy! So the potential here is quite big imho. No need for weird converters (kerasjs) or even weirder js clones (tfjs) if you can run the same backbone of torch itself.
